name: Marketing blog outline
objective: Draft a blog post outline explaining how multi-agent automation accelerates business workflows.
context: Target operations teams at fast-growing startups and emphasise collaboration between planner, executor, and reviewer personas.
deliverable: A Markdown outline with sections and bullet points ready for content writers.
constraints: Limit the outline to no more than seven major sections.
Highlight at least one comparison with traditional single-agent approaches.

name: Internal process improvement memo
objective: Summarise opportunities to introduce skill-based automation within our internal analytics workflow.
context: Assume the company currently relies on manual spreadsheet updates and wants to adopt LLM powered agents.
deliverable: A concise memo with recommendations and next steps.
constraints: Prioritise changes that can be validated within two weeks.
Include risk mitigation strategies for cross-team adoption.
